http.title: Tuborg
http.html:
Tuborg
  • Øl
    • Øl

  • Musik
    • Musik
    • Gør noget ved musikken
    • Grøn Koncert
    • Festivaler
    • Spillesteder
    • Musikhjælp
  • Tuborg'sk
  • Bliv Tuborger

Velkommen

Kom indenfor

Vil du være Tuborger?

Tuborg er ikke bare et sted. Det er for alle os, der elsker Tuborg lidt mere end alle de andre. Græsset er som bekendt ikke altid grønnere på den anden side. Men vi kan garantere, at øllet er det. Meld dig ind og lad os sammen tage hul på et venskab med fælles, grønne værdier.

Bliv Tuborger her

TourBodega og Humørekspressen

På værtshuset, er det nærværet, fællesskabet og tit også den dybe samtale, det handler om. Vi er gået sammen med Humørekspressen, for at slå et slag for de danske værtshuse, én gang for alle. Følg med i den landsdækkende turné, "TourBodega".

Læs mere om TourBodega her

Tuborgfondet støtter Natteravnene

Vi er stolte af og taknemmelige for, at Tuborgfondet har indgået et støttesamarbejde med Natteravnene, så de kan hverve nye frivillige, der blandt andet kan passe på os i de glatte julefrokost tider.

Læs mere om samarbejdet her

Blood of Lucifer

Uffe og hans band Blood of Lucifer er efter mange års stilhed tilbage på landevejen. Men vil de nogensinde opnå succes? Se med i en satan af en miniserie om drømme, madpakker og metalmusik på Tuborgfondet Musikhjælp.

Se alle afsnit her

En væg af musik

Efter lang tids ønske om at give et permanent værk til Vesterbro, kan VEGA i samarbejde med Tuborg endelig løfte sløret for et gigantisk gavlværk af den anerkendte canadiske kunstner Geoff McFetridge, der etableres i september på Vesterbrogade. Værket har navnet  ’As We Improvise We Disappear’.  Læs mere om samarbejdet og værket på VEGAs hjemmeside.

www.vega.dk

Når Tuborg

... serverer en ny kampagne er der lidt for enhver smag... selvfølgelig. Skål og skrål med, når vi knapper op for den gamle sangskat, gode øl og gode minder.

Se hvornår

Tuborg RÅ

Hvorfor er det nu lige, at Tuborg RÅ hedder som den gør? Og hvad er den egentlig lavet af? Poulsen har sin helt egen teori...

Følg ølkuskene på Facebook

Musikken

Tuborg gør noget ved musikken...

Mere om Tuborg og musikken

Grøn Tuborg

Med strejf af blomster

Grøn Tuborg er Danmarks allerførste pilsnerøl, som så dagens lys for første gang helt tilbage i 1880. Læs mere om Grøn Tuborg.

Grøn Tuborg

Important News

 

- MEBA Medical and Benefits Plan– Changes regarding Out-of-Pocket Limits effective

January 1, 2019.

- The Internal Revenue Code (IRC) limits your MEBA 401(k) Plan combined Pre-Tax Elective Contributions and Designated Roth Contributions to all qualified retirement plans to a maximum annual amount.  If you will be age 50 or older, a higher annual limit applies.  For plan year 2019, the  annual limit will increase to $19,000.00.  If you are over age 50 the limit increases by $6,000.00 for Catch-up Contribution, to  a total of $25,000.00. 

Important News

 

- MEBA Medical and Benefits Plan– Changes regarding Out-of-Pocket Limits effective

January 1, 2019.

- The Internal Revenue Code (IRC) limits your MEBA 401(k) Plan combined Pre-Tax Elective Contributions and Designated Roth Contributions to all qualified retirement plans to a maximum annual amount.  If you will be age 50 or older, a higher annual limit applies.  For plan year 2019, the  annual limit will increase to $19,000.00.  If you are over age 50 the limit increases by $6,000.00 for Catch-up Contribution, to  a total of $25,000.00. 

The Funds

Medical & Benefits

Providing medical, prescription drug, dental, life, accidental death and accidental dismemberment coverage for active and retired participants and eligible dependents

Pension

A defined benefit pension plan that offers financial security throughout your retirement years

Money
Purchase Benefit

Providing supplemental retirement security through a defined contribution plan to help you save for your future.

401(k)

Providing supplemental retirement security through a defined contribution plan to help you save for your future through pre-tax and after-tax contributions

Training

Providing marine engineers, deck officers and other MEBA members with state of the art training and experience

Vacation

Providing benefits for your non-working days and wages for Port Relief employment

I want to...

Frequently Asked Questions

Where can I find an in-network provider/hospital with CareFirst Blue Cross Blue Shield in my area?

You may call 800-810-2583 or visit their website at www.BCBS.com.

See all FAQs

Why do I have to pay for a Pre-Employment Drug Test?

In order to have your Pre-Employment drug test covered by the plan, you are required to have worked in Covered Employment for at least 60 days in the six-month period immediately preceding your drug test; and such Covered Employment must be with Employers that participate in the Federal Drug Testing Program.

New Entrants in the Plan, or employees who have not previously participated in the plan, will become eligible after completing 30 days of Covered Employment within any period of six consecutive calendar months.

See all FAQs

My address has recently changed, who do I need to notify?

You would need to complete a Change of Address Form, which can be found under Forms & Documents, Member Services Forms. We cannot take address changes over the phone; the form must be submitted in writing, signed and dated by the member.

See all FAQs
